question:
Consider the following statements about the Technology Acquisition and Development Fund (TADF) Scheme:
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
  2. It aims at providing capital subsidy of 25 percent on electronic products and machinery imported in India
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect. Technology Acquisition and Development Fund has been launched under National Manufacturing Policy by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry. Second statement is incorrect. The scheme aims at facilitating acquisition of clean, green and energy efficient technologies by the Micro Small and Medium Enterprises. It aims to catalyse the manufacturing growth in MSME sector to contribute to the national focus of “Make in India”. It is being implemented through Global Innovation and Technology Alliance (GITA). Under the scheme, the manufacturing units are provided with a subsidy of up to 10% of capital expenditure incurred on new plant & machinery subject to a maximum of Rs. 50 lakhs.
